title: Strengthening Medical Practical Competencies: Gesture-Based Instructional Design Scenarios for Understanding Statistical Concepts

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic statistical terminology (mean, variance, etc.)
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for medical/nursing field practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can provide explanations that simultaneously consider the mean and standard deviation in real data scenarios.
Learners can physically embody and explain statistical concepts by mimicking a teacher's gestures.
Learners can accurately predict data distributions by interpreting statistical graphs through gestures.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
